name: TechnossusVersionAssemblies
description: Allows you to version assemblies before building your solution.
author: Technossus LLC

inputs.name: productVersion
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: This should be in the format of $(Major).$(Minor).$(Patch).$(Build). If you set your build number format to $(Year:yy)$(DayOfYear)$(rev:.r), you can just use 1.0.$(Build.BuildNumber) as your assembly version.
